files.content:
# API Specifications

## POST /api/auth/register
Register a new user.

## POST /api/auth/login
Authenticate user and return JWT.

## GET /api/dashboard
Get dashboard data (authenticated).

specifications.title: User Registration API
specifications.description: REST API endpoint for user registration

specifications.title: User Login API
specifications.description: REST API endpoint for user authentication

specifications.title: Dashboard API
specifications.description: REST API endpoint for dashboard data
